full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 but ED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUST IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE PLEASE REFER TO THIS FILE NUMBER 70 Columbus Avenue New York 23, N. Y. A10 294 862 PAR June 27, 1957 Mr. Mar Doo or Mar Au Sang Soon Hing Farms Green Lawn Long Island, N. Y. Dear Sir: Please call at the office listed below, at the time and place indicated, for an interview in connection with an official matter. It is important that you keep this appointment. If you are unable to do so, please notify us promptly, using the reverse side of this letter, and we will arrange another appointment. You should bring this letter with you and present it at the location indicated below. Very truly yours, DISTRICT DIRECTOR A. J. Salturelli OFFICE AT: 70 Columbus Ave., New York, st ROOM NO. Chief Parele Section 11 DATE AND HOUR July 3, 1957; 1:00 P.M. FLOOR NO 10 ASK FOR Mr. Flashner, Immigrant Inspector REASON FOR APPOINTMENT passport matter BRING WITH YOU: CC: Haskell R. Barst, Esquire 60 Broad Street New York, N. Y. G-56 (11-1-56) question u residences in Hong King P7/E8 eluted Hongling
